title: Setup Base Monitoring Infrastructure with Prometheus and Grafana
description: Setup Prometheus server, Grafana dashboards, AlertManager, and system metrics exporters (Node Exporter, cAdvisor).

effort_estimate.justification: Setting up base monitoring infrastructure is crucial for understanding system performance and health.

user_stories: As a system administrator, I want to monitor system resources so that I can identify bottlenecks and ensure optimal performance.
business_rules: Prometheus must be configured to collect system metrics.
Grafana dashboards must be created to visualize key metrics.
AlertManager must be configured to send notifications for critical events.
edge_cases: Handling high volumes of metrics data.
Ensuring the monitoring system is secure.

acceptance_criteria: Prometheus server is running and collecting system metrics.
Grafana dashboards are created and displaying key metrics.
AlertManager is configured and sending notifications for critical events.
Node Exporter and cAdvisor are collecting system metrics.

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure Prometheus and Grafana are properly configured and integrated.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the monitoring system to prevent unauthorized access.
